copyright.description: A copyright message suitable for display to credit the content creator.

generator.description: Tool that generated this glTF model.  Useful for debugging.

version.description: The glTF version in the form of `<major>.<minor>` that this asset targets.

minVersion.description: The minimum glTF version in the form of `<major>.<minor>` that this asset targets. This property **MUST NOT** be greater than the asset version.
